description: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0sih","text":" The polymerase chaine reaction (PCR) amplifies linear DNA using a DNA polymerase enzyme and a pair of short single-stranded DNA \"primers.\" This protocol is for amplifying the URA3 gene from the YTK74 plasmid and adding the homology sequences needed for homology-directed repair.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cefn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo4lc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cb91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E0A9B43019B011EDB81A9D4A99ACCB21","height":610,"id":280880,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"PCR-homology.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iujubvh6p.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iujsbvh6p.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iujtbvh6p.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iujrbvh6p.webp","width":449}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"15nqu","text":"Check that the thermocycler is programmed and holding at 98°C. The thermocycler program we're using is the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h6fh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpfu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6n5je","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a8i0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca4i8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar0qc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a11j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["140","130"],"data":[["98°C for 30 seconds",""],["Repeat 35 times:",""],["","98°C for 5 seconds"],["","60°C for 15 seconds"],["","72°C for 30 seconds"],["72°C for 2 minutes",""],["Hold at 8°C",""]],"guid":"4B97D1A019B111EDB81A9D4A99ACCB21","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["98°C for 30 seconds",""],["Repeat 35 times:",""],["","98°C for 5 seconds"],["","60°C for 15 seconds"],["","72°C for 30 seconds"],["72°C for 2 minutes",""],["Hold at 8°C",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lipt","text":"Do not skip this step -- you don't want to wait for a thermocycler to warm up!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8k7e","text":"Mix the reaction by gently flick the tube several times, then spin down in a microfuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a51uf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aijj1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bt2rs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":60,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"47mrh","text":"Do this quickly and return the tube to the ice bucket ASAP. There aren't enough thermocycler blocks for every group -- you may need to wait to share a thermocycler with other groups.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sl63","text":"Transfer the tube from ice to a pre-heated thermocycler holding at 98°C. Start the PCR program.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7pb42","text":"After the PCR program has run, store the tube at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"fe955","text":"None of the materials used in this lab are hazardous.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15bn8","text":"HOWEVER, we are shedding nucleases -- enzymes that degrade DNA -- all the time.
